title: Fist bumps instead of handshakes: Biden tries to 'minimize contact' in Israel and Saudi Arabia
content:
1. Fist bumps instead of handshakes: Biden tries to 'minimize contact' in Israel and Saudi Arabia  CNN
  2. Biden shakes hands with Netanyahu after WH vowed he'd avoid the action on Mideast trip  Fox News
  3. Biden embraces a signature Trump achievement on first trip to the Middle East, aiming to bring Israel and Saudi Arabia closer  CNN
  4. Biden betrays Khashoggi, campaign promises in quest for Saudi oil  The Hill
  5. Biden needs to stick to a plan for his Middle East trip to be successful  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 握手の代わりに拳を突き合わせる。バイデン氏、イスラエルとサウジアラビアで「接触を最小限に」するよう試みる
碰拳头而不是握手。拜登试图在以色列和沙特阿拉伯 "减少接触"。
碰拳頭而不是握手。拜登試圖在以色列和沙特阿拉伯 "減少接觸"。
